title: La Chapelle-Vaupelteigne
description: Gallo-Roman villas located in the valley of the Serein, a tributary of the Yonne river, dating from the first to the fourth centuries AD.

properties.description: Representative location based on OpenStreetMap. PECS locates the archaeological remains of at least two Roman villas in the vicinity of the modern settlement.
properties.title: OSM location of modern La Chapelle-Vaupelteigne
